attributes.action: give the people the power of impeachment of any member of the houses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
of Commons and Lords. Reinstating the power of impeachment into the land and give the citizen the right to remove by vote their representative for gross misconduct etc. 
Definitions for impeach - challenge the honesty or veracity of; charge (a public official) with an offense or misdemeanor committed while in office; accuse: bring an accusation against; level a charge against;

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
